entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix Android CarouselView so you don't need to add a delay after switching ItemSources to Set Position #24499
    Backlog
  • HybridWebView: browser dev tools not working #24497
  • Picker to Entry selections causes keyboard to cover low inputs #24496
  • Custom Control ItemTemplate fails to change at runtime in MAUI iOS #24492
  • WebAuthenticatorResult fails in release mode "Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializationException: A member with the name '' already exists on 'Microsoft.Maui.Authentication.WebAuthenticatorResult'. Use the JsonPropertyAttribute to specify another name." #24491
  • [net9.0] Mac TitleBar implementation #24489
    9.0-rc2
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Every quit and exit method throws an exception #24486
    9.0-rc2
  • Calendar Icon not shown in android phone. #24483
  • [Windows] CarouselView has issues with the initial rendering of items and doesn't scroll to the correct position when Loop is enabled #24482

Closed

  • [MAUI] From 'Edit recipe' to return to the Recipe details, the 'Ingredients' & 'Recipe' contents appear blank. #24434
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #17283
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Propagate Measured Changed calls up the xplat hierarchy #22978
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Adding/Removing layout children does not invalidate measures #20181
    Backlog
  • iOS: CollectionView items don't change their size when item content size is changed #15177
    Backlog
  • Trim warnings when publishing `dotnet new maui` #24062
    9.0-rc2
  • Look at wiring ShellContent Pages into the life cycle of container registration #5686
    9.0-preview7
  • Add hooks to disconnect/connect a PlatformView from a Handler in order to avoid memory leaks #16332
    9.0-preview7
  • Moving Items between groups of a Grouped CollectionView in Android throws a IndexOutOfBoundsException #23138
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Moving items in grouped CollectionView is moving the wrong items #21698
    Backlog
  • Moving one item between groups of a Grouped CollectionView results in the temporary fading out of two items instead of one on Android #23152
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Issue with iOS Application Icon: App Store Publishing Failed - AppIcon Missing (Asset Validation Error) #24300

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve Android device type check to use screen size #24495
  • [Testing]Changed Scroll to 12, added comment #24494
    area-testing
  • [xamlc] return early in `NodeILExtensions` for `ValidateOnly` #24493
    area-xaml
  • Remove netPrevious TFMs from RC/GA #24488
    area-infrastructure
  • Resolved Text Jump Issue in Entry Control with HorizontalTextAlignment Set to End #24485
    community ✨, area-controls-entry

Merged

  • Remove code from iOS that short circuits propagation #24477
    area-navigation
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled. #24431
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1][macios] Bump to the latest macios 9.0 RC1 #24487
  • [Binding SG] Refactor data models #24462
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Fix item fading when moving between groups in Grouped CollectionView #24461
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update net9 arcade bits #24473
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Bump macios bits #24481

Updated

  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells (#15831)" #24310
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [iOS] SwipeView: Fix reenabling parent scrolling after cancelled swipe #23442
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing
  • add mapper for IsSwipePagingEnabledProperty on Android #24322
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #20759
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Clean up #23714
    area-xaml
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-editor
  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Update FlyoutViewHandler.Android.cs #24394
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
